Windlord/Kup:
Kup and Windlr say together in a corder of the room but pretty close to  Leo 
Prime, while Talon moved close to Tucson Prime


Windlord raised his hand " We must insolate the ark too... if history have 
to follow the proper course as you said; Just the Ark and the Nemesis have 
to remain here; and for the predacons, it seems that they have to be removed 
by brute force cause I highly doubt that with them diplomacy works"

"WE ARE MAXIMALS AND AUTOBOTS, THAT ISNT OUR STYLE" protested Kup

"If you have a better idea, Kup, say it"replied Winlord

"But we have to make priorities too " replied Talon "Pick up every single 
piece of our presence in this planet, and making test that every is allright 
for the coming human race... We have to make a plan, a plan that involves 
everithing"



-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, June 22, 2011 1:18 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)
emesis
> <OLD>
>
> Tucson raises a hand in complete agreement.
>
> " I give Leo Prime all of my support on this topic.  And as a Prime myself 
> I
> wish to see this change follow through faithfully. "
>
> He turns his head in Leo Prime's direction.
>
> " Earth is not our home but Cybertron is. We must right the wrongs that 
> have
> been committed and send the Predicons and Decepticons to an exile that 
> will
> prevent them from ever returning to this planet."
>
> He too, with the faceplate and near voice pattern of Optimus Prime, Tucson
> Prime turns his head to everyone in the room.
>
> " If I'm not mistaken Char is still inhabitable. I suggest we do as Leo
> Prime suggests and round up our adversaries and exile them to Char as soon
> as we can all manage."

<NEW>

LEO PRIME nods, "Yes that is a possibility that we have been
considering. Good, good thinking Tuscon Prime."

He turned as another hand was raised, smiled and gestured for STRAIGHT
SHOT's comment.

> Straight Shot raises her hand.
>
> " If we're gonna pull it off, a certain Prime is gonna need his sight 
> back.
> Tucson Prime always does so much for all of us.  The least we can do now 
> is
> make him whole again.  "

The was another nod from LEO PRIME, "Yes, medical help for all of us,
yes that is something that we need to emphasize. Good."

LEO turned to acknowledge LORD ELDER as he also raised his hand.

"We must not forget that the threat of Unicron is still out there."
LORD ELDER's voice was grave as he spoke. "While we are rounding up
criminals, a way must be found to deal with him and his minions."

LEO PRIME's face was thoughtful as he listened. "You bring up a good
point Lord Elder." LEO turned to face the audience, "That is one of
the reasons why we are having this discussion." A frown briefly traced
itself across his fetures as he continued, "This will be the most
difficult task, one that the council members even now are still
deliberating on. Does anyone have any suggestions?"

(TAG)

Preston
